title: Candle Media Adds Courtney Cappa as Senior Vice President Finance & Accounting, and Kendall Ostrow as Senior Vice President, Business Development & Community - Business Wire
content: Candle Media Adds Courtney Cappa as Senior Vice President Finance & Accounting, and Kendall Ostrow as Senior Vice President, Business Development & Community  Business Wire
description: The global leader in press release distribution and regulatory disclosure. Public relations and investor relations professionals rely on Business Wire for broad-based and targeted market reach.
